City Icons

Commissioned by Offscreen Magazine for their fifth issue feature "A Web Worker's Field Guide", this collection of icons depicts a well known building or ideogram from 14 cities around the world.

  • Cape Town
  • London
  • New York
  • Sydney
  • Dublin
  • Berlin
  • San Francisco
  • Amsterdam
  • Tokyo
  • Stockholm
  • Wellington
  • Paris
  • Barcelona
  • Austin
Download now

Proudly sponsored by

The download contains the master EPS file in CS3 - CS6 format, 512px SVGs and 512px PNGs. It's worth noting these icons were designed for print so they are not snapped to a precise pixel grid.
